title: Add YouTube, LinkedIn, Instagram, and Telegram links to the Connect section

requirements.text: Update the site "Connect" social icon links to use the provided URLs (YouTube, LinkedIn, Instagram, Telegram) instead of placeholder "#" links wherever the "Connect"/social icons are rendered (including the footer "Connect" section and the Contact page "Follow Us" section).
acceptanceCriteria: In the footer "Connect" section (frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx), the YouTube icon links to https://youtube.com/@hackrootorg2.0?si=SCyY3YuqXwv9OusU, the LinkedIn icon links to https://www.linkedin.com/in/bablu-kumar-8bb7b3257?utm_source=share&utm_campaign=share_via&utm_content=profile&utm_medium=android_app, the Instagram icon links to https://www.instagram.com/hackrootorg.in?igsh=ZHpwemQzbDFza2I3, and the Telegram icon links to https://t.me/hackrootorg.
On the Contact page "Follow Us" section (frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx), the same four icons link to the same provided URLs.
All external social links open in a new tab and include rel="noopener noreferrer".
No social icon uses "#" for the four provided networks after the change.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other frontend immutablePaths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Adding new social networks not provided by the user.
Changing site navigation structure, routes, or backend canister logic.
